name: caremanager
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: care manager
des:
It is an open skill that allows either caregivers and people who need care to coordinate care tasks. Once you setup the skill, the user is allowed to add people to the skill, add care activities and link those activities with people in the list. After that, anytime you can view the care activities by person and you have the option to delete tasks and add other new tasks.
* Note: This skill is part of school project for the University of Bristol and it will not be used for any commercial purposes.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
